name: indiscretion
content:
Add to word list

[ U ] the quality of being indiscreet: Jones was censured for indiscretion in leaking a secret report to the press.
[ C ] something, especially a sexual relationship, that is considered embarrassing or morally wrong: youthful indiscretion We should forgive him a few youthful indiscretions.
